Articles.Content:
I just have to say the new snapshots of the new space center are looking EPIC. One thing I did notes is that the background of the whole space center is probly just a place holder. Don't get to excited. Clouds will come in time.

Cant wait till the next update. This is better than rescores.
Wow, I thought that was fan art. But no, that is the future Space Center
It'll be crazy:D

...I have not heard about this.

I kind of like the old center, to be honest.

Photo was taken from the weekly update below:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/content.php/193

It only says that the Kerbal that took the photo only digitally added the weird gas clumps in the sky before handing it to KSP devs.

PS. Why would a Kerbal add that? It's just so weird looking. These "clouds" look awful.
There is a certain appeal to the old buildings, but I'm definitely looking forward to the new buildings
That first shot is now my desktop background. I can't stop staring at it! Agreed, forget resources! Gimme gimme gimme 'that'!!

Hmm...

I thought the first one was not in the game, only there to illustrate the change...

I think I'm wrong...

Hope it comes out nicely!

I just piloted a bunch of planes I made using the B9 aerospace pack. I shut down KSP (for now), check the forums, and what's staring me in the face?

A WHOLE SPACEPLANE HANGAR BUILT BY BAC9 HIMSELF!

Holy crap on a cracker in jeb's hand strapped to the side of an SRB!!

(in case you can't tell, i'm a bit excited for the new update. just a little)

Hey, listen! I have an idea!

How about we buzz the tower?
As they spill coffee on themselves and shake their fists at us angrily!
Could someone brighten up the buildings in the first picture? I'm curious to see what the detailing on the new buildings looks like.
I..how...wha...wow...who...SPH!

Hey, listen! I have an idea!

We're not buzzing the tower.

How about we buzz the tower?

I said no.

Could someone brighten up the buildings in the first picture? I'm curious to see what the detailing on the new buildings looks like.

Yup, here you go.

Due to the the sun and the and the inefficient way of dark visualization with brightness, I made another one, which allows much more detail (only traces, no color though).

Here:
Lets hope there remains some uneven terrain to test rovers and the like on.

We're not buzzing the tower.

I said no.

But WHY?!? And, dang it dude! You almost broke my screen with that sig!
Is there also going to be a new VAB? I would be sad and lonely if there isn't a new VAB.
That picture looks like a real photo... is it?
Yes, it's a real photo. The devs have decided to stop working on a game, and they're building a real Kerbin instead.

That picture looks like a real photo... is it?

I'm 99.99% certain it is.

Unless squad has *real looking* trees and shacks in the background (see left corner), shrubbery (right corner). large numbers of polys to get those ac vents, pipes... well, yeah... I'll leave you 0.01% it is in game.

^ Not a real bug

Edited June 26, 2013 by Fel

I try not to spend too long at KSC, but it certainly is pretty now! Maybe after that will come some pretty terrain and atmospherics.

Heck, maybe the Kerbals will see just how pretty the whole place is and decide to come up from their subterranean colonies to build actual settlements...
I just can't stop looking at that picture its so amazing!!!!!!

I'm glad they used giant mothership/UFO clouds. Kerbal.

edit: Oh god, I just used "Kerbal" as slang for cool or something.
Seems very well.
